<lj-embed id="9"/>


<small>
When I get to Warwick Avenue
Meet me by the entrance of the tube
We can talk things over a little time
Promise me you won't step outta line

When I get to Warwick Avenue
Please drop the past and be true
Don't think we're okay, just because I'm here
You hurt me bad, but I won't shed a tear

I'm leaving you for the last time baby
You think you're loving but you don't love me
I've been confused outta my mind lately
You think you're loving but I want to be free
Baby you've hurt me

When I get to Warwick Avenue
We'll spend an hour, but no more than two
Our only chance to speak once more
I showed you the answers, now here's the door

When I get to Warwick Avenue
I'll tell you baby that we're through

I'm leaving you for the last time baby
You think you're loving but you don't love me
I've been confused outta my mind lately
You think you're loving but you don't love me
I want to be free, baby you've hurt me

All the days spent together, I wished for better
But I didn't want the train to come
Now it's departed
I'm broken hearted, seems like we never started
All those days spent together, when I wished for better
And I didn't want the train to come

You think you're loving but you don't love me
I want to be free, baby you've hurt me
You don't love me, I want to be free
Baby you've hurt me

<lj-embed id="8"/>

<small>


So now you want the whole world to notice that you've come around,
Now you expect,
We'll see how you're really so much better now,
But I know the truth, I won't waste my youth

On a cad and a bounder, a dog and a cheat
All the lives that you've had, all the hearts you eat
You're a rascal and a rogue, a villain and a crook
Still I tug at your line, I'm a fish on your hook
I should be better, but I'm worse...

What's the point pretending that you could be a better man (oohhooh)
Just give in, since you always end up right back where you began (ohhooh)
Still I know the truth, but I have a sweet tooth...

For a cad and a bounder, a dog and a cheat
All the lives that you've had, all the hearts you eat
You're a rascal and a rogue, a villain and a crook
Still I tug at your line, I'm a fish on your hook
You're rash and you're hasty
You're reckless with my heart, still I wait by the phone
I will never get smart
I should be better, but I'm worse...

(Still I know the truth, but I have a sweet tooth)

For a cad and a bounder, a dog and a cheat
All the lives that you've had, all the hearts you eat
You're a rascal and a rogue, a villain and a crook
Still I tug at your line, I'm a fish on your hook
You're rash and you're hasty
You're reckless with my heart, still I wait by the phone
I will never get smart
I should be better, but I'm worse...

<small>i like when a song can represent the way you feel. or felt <3 

<lj-embed id="6"/>

<small>
Wait, do you see my heart on my sleeve?
It's been there for days on end and
It's been waiting for you to open up
Just you baby, come on now
I'm trying to tell you just how
I'd like to hear the words roll out of your mouth finally
Say that it's always been me

That's made you feel a way you've never felt before
And I'm all you need and that you never want more
Then you'd say all of the right things without a clue
But you'd save the best for last
Like I'm the one for you

You should know that you're just a temporary fix
This is not rooted with you it don't mean that much to me
You're just a filler in the space that happened to be free
How dare you think you'd get away with trying to play me

Why is it everytime I think I've tried my hardest
It turns out it ain't enough cause you're still not mentioning love
What am I supposed to do to make you want me properly?
I'm taking these chances and getting away
And though I'm trying my hardest you back to her
And I think that I know things may never change
I'm still hoping one day I might hear you say

I make you feel a way you've never felt before
And I'm all you need and that you never want more
Then you'd say all of the right things without a clue
But you'd save the best for last
Like I'm the one for you

You should know that you're just a temporary fix
This is not rooted with you it don't mean that much to me
You're just a filler in the space that happened to be free
How dare you think you'd get away with trying to play me

But, despite the truth that I know
I find it hard to let go and give up on you
Seems I love the things you do
Like the meaner you treat me the more eager I am
To persist with this heartbreak and running around
And I think that I know things may never change
I'm still hoping one day I might hear you say

I make you feel a way you've never felt before
And I'm all you need and that you never want more
And we'll say all of the right things without a clue
And you'll be the one for me and me the one for you

<lj-embed id="5"/>
<small>
Please don't say we're done
When I'm not finished
I could give you so much more
Make you feel, like never before
Welcome, they said welcome to the floor

It's been a while
And you've found someone better
But I've been waiting too long to give this up
The more I see, I understand
But sometimes, I still need you

Sometimes, I still need you

I was struggling to get in
Left waiting outside your door
I was sure
You'd give me more

No need to come to me
When I can make it all the way to you
You made it clear
You weren't near
Near enough for me

Heart skipped a beat
And when I caught it you were out of reach
But I'm sure, I'm sure
You've heard it before

ohai cute things that's happened since the last time ive wrote on this shmutz June 27th Sophie's birthday June 28 my dance recital July 10th hung out with shmeederz July 11th my 1st rave FRESH SQUEEZED i gots a whole rave family and everything my raver name: paparazzi July 18th KKP3 July 20th Joseph's 23rd birthday & our 1 year and 7 months ♥ July 21st dance started up again July 31st hung out with Paul for the 1st time in awhile oh and Jessica too. only had fun with Paul, thats the thang. Aug 1st Infocus. yeah. not a good day that whole day started bad when i drank coffee with an empty stomach and felt nasty most of the morning then i got a ride there from a complete stranger he was chiil (till the end of the night) we left @ 5 &then on the way there we were texted that the place was change to all these different places we went to a couple of them till we were actually at the right place which we got to at 7? long story shot we waited in line from 7 to 1 never got to go in nuffn but the line was fun kept the time going by we left @ 2ish tho and went to a party that i didnt even want to go to... i was tired and cramping and wanted to be in my own bed but my ride was rolling and wanted to have fun with his friends.. yay and so like that, i got home @ 5 Aug 2nd Cristi's birthday she picked me up around 1230 and we went to the beach for the day it was her family and me. lol i had fun tho then after the beach we went to a cantina and drank margaritas & played drinking games woo Aug. (4th)going to DANCE with some gurLs from school in 2 weeks or so im going with Jackson to the American Apparel Warehouse soo excited for that! thur the 7th rileys 19 th bday bobby riley and I went to china town in the morning and bought knifes and what not then riley bought some shoes and other shit for his birthday i had to be back before 1:30 for orientations i went to that shit they only took 25 people; what a BITCH! so ima either wait till feb. or go to newberry in sept. then i had work at 4 to close. bobby took me and we got some foods before i went and he also picked me up from work fri the 8th we were supposed to go to the beach. but bobby got his car too late so we just went around we went to some park up in the hills for awhile then we went to target then to porter ranch then i had to go to work bobby came by my work around 8:30 and then we were gonna see a movie but he was sleepy so we just drove around and went back up to the park and talked then oscar calls me @ 1 in the morning i had to sneak him and his friend in my room they only stayed for like a half hour tho they were all drunk and knocked out yesterday sat the 9th the 3 amigos, haha, we went to hollywood in the morning and just walked around it was pretty chill we were there for awhile then we got back to the valley and got shit from our houses to go to the beach we got there around 4? and we were just posted there for awhile i kinda went in the water only like up to my knee tho then we all went home and took a shower @ 8:30 bobby picked me back up and then we got nigga baby and riley and we went to see pineapple express omgosh the worst trying to get in tho me and nigga baby were the ones who bought the tickets then when we got up, we threw our stubs down, and the fucking security asked to see our tickets lmao so we went back down while the guys got to go in we ended up getting in tho; we had riley put the ticket stubs in a cup and threw it down to us (on my head) hahahaha then we watched the movie it was funny then went home long day

2 days ago. i worked morning 9 to 4 me and stoop are done talking. for good? i kinda hope so im sick of being hurt by that lame ass fuckerr and tell me why i stop talking to stoop and oscar starts talking to me? crazyyy. :D anyways... then around 6 oscar picked me up to go to the pawn shop but they were closed so i had him take me to cvs to steal some Cs but him and chris decided they didnt wanna do those shits so we tried to find some E but fucking no1 had any tthey left around 8:30 yesterday. oscar came over in the morning to nap. then i got ready to hang out with rosie i met up with her at the orange line. i was with rosie most of the day. oh yee, i went to the pawn shop to pawn josephs ring... i got 10$ oh wow but whatever i was gonna throw it away then i went to look at the newberry school for cosmetology i fucking love it there 2mrw i find out if theres room for me at west valley then, i went to nigga babys house then i had bobby pick me and rosie up and we went to the topanga mall and then paul got off work and then... lol me and bobby picked up riley and we all went to tarzana park after the park i went to pauls house with rosie then i left to meet up with izzy we did Cs oh man, i havent done those shits since christmas then i went home around 8:30? and knocked the fuck out today i had work again this morning bobby kept me company the whole day <3 then when i got off we picked up riley and we went to groove riders i got riley and oscar some cans from some other store (rileys bday gift) and we tried getting riley to get his ears pierced but his mom said nooo me and robert are gonna get our nipples WATCH! bobby had to pick up his mom so i got dropped off with riley at his house oscar and all them blazed i just sat and waited for bobby ew and evry1 wanted to go to the beach (point dume) but not everybody could have fit; so just me bobby and riley went it was pretty fucking fun well i had fun it was a pretty chill day ew and all me and bobby ate was junk we hardly ate anyhting tho 2mrw CHINA TOWN in the morning 9 sharp me riley and bobby and maybe nennia then orientations for west valley at 1 then work 4 to close and maybe ppl will come over for rileys bday but thats not a furrsherr thing. oscar said he loved me today! ive been waiting <333
i miss the cousins. lmfao i love kids<3

ew. so much has happened. i feel like i dont do much of anything, but i do soo much UPDATE: June 19 2,000 and 8 I graduated! aint no big thang then after graduations oscar, lovely, riley, chris amd I went out. we basically just drove around. sarah thought she was faded LMFAO yelling out "40 CRIPS ROLLING!!!!!" :/ oh hellz then oscars car broke down lmao. we had gramps come put some anti freeze in it it wasnt all fixed but it got oscar home. ...then... June 29 (dat after edc EH) MY SHOW! sarah and robert went; and riley and oscar showed up and got to see 3 of my dances i was in 10 numbers i think it went well messed up cuz my nerves got tume, ppl watching me, blehh then i split a hash brownie with oscar it was soo DANK! hahhaha ...then... me and robert had adventures the first week he had summer schools he would come and pick me up @ 10ish and oh man there was this one day 1st we got a ticket [speeding on the freeway duh]hahah then we crashed and broke his baby kia [baby kia My ant!-DruG] all cuz of LOVELY its mah parDeee; sweet 18! loved that day funday sunday! but it was tuesday? ...thenn... well recently stoop came to cali july 7th? ew i should know, we picked him up from the airport. yeah it was crazy he finally found out bout oscar cuz roman told him which i didnt mind at all its just that, i wasnt ready to say i was with some1 yee, i basically got soo much shit from stoop told me he hates me im dead to him; but like this foo cheated on me i was pissed cuz he gave me soo much shit when he was doing the same shit too like HELLO! oh and oscar broke up with me while stoop was here it was hard cuz i love oscar but he said he was fucking up on me... and wow. tell me why when he asked me out he gave me a big hug and said "plz dont hurt me erica" and when he told me that my heart melted; cuz i knew i could hurt him cuz i could always go back to stoop anytime but i didnt want to hurt him hes the one who ended up hurting me. but we are still close, very close he says he love me, just doesnt want a gf right now and still wants me in his life i think cuz its summer, but i said naww.... basically he doesnt wanna feel guilty when he cheats [i say] well any way... back to stoop soo much fighting he fucking had some nasty ass shit on his phone he stayed at my house and was talking to some bitch on the phone who texted him saying how good his dick would feel in her and this fool was trying to get with me like i dont know i thought i was gonna marry this kid but fuck like he said 'love only goes so far' idk anymore. hes like super into me more than ever and i aint really into him maybe right now isnt the time for us but who knows? what if i now think oscar could be the ONE maybe im just to young to even be thinking bout that kinda stuff i have my whole life ahead of me but then again, what if i never find any1? and i fuck up everything ughhh

hahah. i always promise myself that i will write on this thing more often. i like to look back @ shit i did MEMORIES<3 i wouldnt change any of them. i soo cant wait to get out of school. super excited! time went by fast; thank GOD. but it needs to be done with alreadys me and robert have our reasons <333 and those reasons just want me to be an extra positive person. there really is two ways to look @ things u can either think negative or positive. and once ur in the habbit of being negative its hard to think positive my brain hurts... @$#$%@$! yogurtree is just alittle being a bitchtume. i gots to prove myself; then they'll start giving me hour hahaha sux. eww. ive been losing weight like sickkk i dont like it anymore im not on no diet it just keeps coming off it scares me :( i swear ima die. WAHH! pray for me maybe its the adderall.... oh and stoop<3 that kid he kills me sometimes but this morning he texted me saying " I N0 i SAId That i C0uld get 0ver U, (i Lied) I REALLY D0NT N0 WAT I W0ULD D0 IF I DIDNT HAVE U BABY" theee best oh and i gots a new phone my little baby slide. but i still miss my pebl but ehhh.

eesh friday was pretty weird. like me indo and richy were suppose to work on a project but richy didnt go to school. so indo called him and he told us to just go over and whatever so after school we go and i see james at the park and we were just talking about stoop :D james doesnt really appreciate that lil suckah. well yeah indo wanted to go to 711 to get something to eat and drink real quick then we go in to carnitas cuz her friends were there.... then freakin efrain goes in he was all bloody and shit cuz he got in to a fight and shit. it was pretty crazy and he has hair now. i was like what the? but yeah that was that then we went to richys house and did the project; kinda.... and went on youtube. it was pretty fun then i got picked up around 6:30 and i saw 'drunk guy' lmao. then @ 11:45 i went to dennys for dee rays bday. i had fun!!!! cuz robert was there. =] then i got home around 2 then saturday i went to dee rays bday part 2... it was akward for me i didnt know half the ppl cuz they are zuleys friends. yuppp. then i got droped off at kennias house shes super sick. ohhh and its been are year today since mikol killed himself :'( and yeee JOSEPH PEREZ♥ MINE!! man i havent updated in foreverz. lol well yeee. basically the only things that are new are: 1. i went to universal for Halloween Horror Nights [Oct 19 2007] 2. i got a job @ yogurtree its alright but it gets boring becasue i have to work alone; except for fridays i work with Ian! THANK GOD. it really is hard having a job i kinda feel like i have no time for myself like i have school, dance classes and now work i dont even hang out with anybody all that much it SUCKS! 3. i went to court [Oct 30 2007] my fine was $495 but if i go to some class about cerfew it will go down to $135 i have 60 days to do that 4. Halloween I WAS A BALLERINA! this year was boring. all i did was go to kennia's but eh.. i had fun and its better than nothing J.P. ♥

things suck; right bout now!! so i AM talking to some guy, and like everything has been going soooo good until recently it sucks man, cuz i really like him...... i mean im only his wifey sometimes i feel like ima be one of those old ladies with 80 cats =/ oh and it my mom seems to ruin EVERYTHING when it comes to me talking to somebody i swear to god. this really really really really sucks; like no joke. shes not even the biggest part of my life and i know she wishes she was; but i like how our relationship is already cuz when she wants to get close to ppl that are close to me she ruins shit. and the funny thing is i havent talked to mom in awhile; & i dont remember metioning this guy to her and i guess my brother talked to this guy (since its his friend) and he told him that my mom wants to meet him. and it like freaked him out UGHHHHH! damn and i all have a project to do; and i havent done SHIT!
STOOP A LOOP this kid, pretty much is always there for me even though he's not even here soo hard to explain.

school has started. its like whatever. i just really wanna get it over with well yeah my week saturday september 8th.
